data.name: Wratharmor
data.description: Armor forged in the heat of battle and tempered with rage. It pulses with aggressive energy.

effects.description: Adds 180 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 28% Water Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 20% Earth Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 7% Water Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 7% Air Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)

data.description: Gleaming armor worn by noble knights who uphold justice and protect the innocent.

effects.description: Adds 180 HP to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Cultist Pants
data.description: Dark, flowing pants worn by cultists during their mysterious rituals. Strange symbols are stitched into the fabric.

Adds 20% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.description: Leg armor that pulses with anger and aggression. The metal seems to vibrate with barely contained rage.

data.description: Gleaming leg armor worn by righteous knights. Their silvery surface never seems to tarnish.

data.name: Cultis Hat
data.description: A dark hood worn by cultists to conceal their identity. Strange runes glow faintly along its edges.

effects.description: Adds 200 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 20% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 3% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Wrathelmet
data.description: A fearsome helmet that enhances battle rage. Its visage is designed to terrify enemies.

effects.description: Adds 200 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30% Earth Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 20% Water Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 20 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)

data.name: White Knight Helmet
data.description: A gleaming helmet that symbolizes purity and justice. Its polished surface catches the light beautifully.

effects.description: Adds 200 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 20% Earth Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 3% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Cultist Boots
data.description: Silent boots worn by those who practice forbidden magic. They leave no tracks, even on soft ground.

effects.description: Adds 160 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 8% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 8% Earth Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 8% Air Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 8% Water Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 7 Haste to its stats when equipped. The haste reduces the cooldown of a fight.

data.name: Mithril Boots
data.description: Boots crafted from pure mithril. Despite their solid construction, they're as light as a feather.

effects.description: Adds 160 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 8% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 8% Water Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 8% Fire Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 8% Earth Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 7 Haste to its stats when equipped. The haste reduces the cooldown of a fight.

data.name: Mithril Shield
data.description: A shield of legendary strength, yet light enough to wield with ease. Its surface never scratches or dents.

effects.description: Adds 15% Fire Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 15% Air Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: White Knight Shield
data.description: A gleaming shield emblazoned with symbols of valor and courage. Seems to absorb incoming blows effortlessly.

effects.description: Adds 15% Earth Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 15% Air Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Book from Hell
data.description: A tome bound in strange leather with pages that seem to burn without being consumed. Contains forbidden knowledge.

data.name: Efreet Cloth
data.description: Fabric woven by fire elementals. It's warm to the touch and seems to flicker like flames in darkness.

data.name: Maple Sap
data.description: Sweet sap collected from ancient maple trees. Has both culinary and alchemical uses.

data.name: Maple Syrup
data.description: Thick, golden syrup with restorative properties. Delicious and highly effective at healing wounds.

effects.description: Heal 500 HP when the item is used.

data.name: Earth Res Potion
data.description: A potion that hardens skin like stone. Grants additional resistance to earth-based attacks.

effects.description: Gives 10% earth resistance at the start of fight.

data.name: Fire Res Potion
data.description: A cool, red liquid that creates a protective barrier against flames when consumed.

effects.description: Gives 10% fire resistance at the start of fight.

data.name: Water Res Potion
data.description: A bubbling blue potion that grants protection against water damage when drunk.

effects.description: Gives 10% water resistance at the start of fight.

data.name: Air Res Potion
data.description: A swirling green potion that provides resistance against air-based attacks when consumed.

effects.description: Gives 10% air resistance at the start of fight.

data.name: Celest Ring
data.description: A ring said to have been forged from a fallen star. It enhances both fire and water magic.

effects.description: Adds 25% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 25% Water Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)

data.name: Page from Hell
data.description: A scorched page torn from some unholy tome. The writing shifts and changes when you try to read it, and it feels unnaturally warm. These pages can be exchanged for a powerful item.

data.name: Elemental Page
data.description: A strange page covered in elemental symbols that seem to move and interact with each other. It hums with magical energy. These pages can be exchanged for a powerful item.

data.name: Greater Healing Rune
data.description: An advanced healing rune that pulses with powerful regenerative magic. Its soothing aura continuously rejuvenates allies while healing the bearer directly.

effects.description: Every 2 played turns, they heal all allies for 12% of their maximum HP. This effect does not heal the caster.
Every 3 played turns, restores 5% of HP at the start of the turn.

data.name: Greater Protection Rune
data.description: A blue-hued stone tablet inscribed with layered defensive sigils. When activated, it creates overlapping shields that absorb physical and magical damage alike.

effects.description: If one or more allies have less than 50% of their HP, protects the ally with the lowest HP percentage, redirecting 50 % of their damage to this character until the start of my next turn. Activates a maximum of 3 times per combat.
When they drop below 40% of their HP, they gain 30 % resistance to all elements for 3 turns. Activates once per combat. This effect is only active during boss fights.

data.name: Greater Lifesteal Rune
data.description: A blood-red rune that pulses with dark hunger. It channels life essence from critical strikes to the bearer while feeding a growing battle frenzy.

effects.description: Restores 20% of the total attack of all elements in HP after a critical strike.
Each time they land a critical hit, they give 10% damage to themselves and their allies until the end of their next turn.

data.name: Vampiric Rune
data.description: A dark crimson rune that seems to drink in surrounding light. It infuses attacks with blood magic that drains life from enemies while fueling a battle rage.

effects.description: After landing a critical hit, they heal the ally with the lowest HP for 25% of the damage dealt. Can only trigger once every 3 turns. This effect does not heal the caster.
Each time they land a critical hit, they give 10% damage to themselves and their allies until the end of their next turn.

data.name: Dark Essence
data.description: A swirling mass of shadowy energy contained in a crystalline vial. Harvested from creatures of darkness, it pulses with malevolent power useful in high-level enchantments.

data.name: Mithril Ring
data.description: A gleaming blue-silver ring that feels unusually light on the finger. The metal amplifies the wearer's natural attributes while enhancing their ability to find treasure.

effects.description: Adds 175 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 20% Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 10 Threat to its stats when equipped.
Adds 80 Initiative to its stats when equipped.
Adds 4% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).
Adds 60 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)

data.name: Mithril Axe
data.description: A razor-sharp axe forged from legendary mithril. Its lightweight yet unbreakable blade allows for swift, effortless woodcutting, prized by seasoned lumberjacks.

effects.description: Adds 5 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -50% when a character logs a tree.

data.name: Mithril Pickaxe
data.description: A masterfully-crafted pickaxe of pure mithril, capable of shattering the hardest ores with ease. Its enchanted tip gleams with an icy brilliance, perfect for expert miners.

effects.description: Adds 5 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -50% when a character mines a resource.

data.name: Mithril Fishing Rod
data.description: A fishing rod woven from enchanted mithril threads. Light as a feather, it grants extraordinary control and lures even the most elusive fish.

effects.description: Adds 5 Water Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -50% when a character is fishing.

data.name: Mithril Gloves
data.description: Gloves crafted from supple mithril mesh. They enhance the dexterity of the wearer, making delicate harvesting and precise alchemical gathering effortless.

effects.description: Adds 5 Air Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -50% when a character harvest a plant.

data.name: Cursed Flash
data.description: A mysterious flask sealed with dark runes. Its contents swirl with a shadowy liquid that radiates an unsettling energy.

data.name: Grimlet Bone
data.description: A massive bone from the fearsome Grimlet beast. It's unnaturally heavy and radiates a faint aura of dread.

data.name: Lava Bucket
data.description: A heavy iron bucket filled with molten lava. Its heat radiates intensely, capable of melting almost anything it touches. Handle with extreme caution.

data.name: Sand Snake Hide
data.description: Rough exterior hide from desert serpents. While less valuable than the inner skin, it still provides excellent protection against the harsh desert elements.

data.name: Sand Snakeskin
data.description: Smooth, iridescent scales from the inner layer of desert serpents. The magically-attuned scales shift color to match their surroundings, making them perfect for protective gear.

data.name: Enchanted Health Potion
data.description: A sparkling potion that restores a tremendous amount of health in critical moments.

effects.description: Restores 300 HP at the start of the turn if the player has lost more than 50% of their health points.

data.name: Bow from Hell
data.description: A bow that seems to have been forged in hellfire itself. Its arrows leave trails of brimstone in the air.

effects.description: Adds 106 Air Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 24% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Hell Staff
data.description: A staff crackling with infernal power. Its wielder can command waters to boil and freeze at will.

effects.description: Adds 115 Water Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Demoniac Dagger
data.description: A twisted dagger that seems to have been forged in the depths of hell itself. Its blade flickers with unholy flames.

effects.description: Adds 85 Fire Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 35% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).
